mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.team_name as teamName, t.team_type as teamType, t.comp_id as compId, c.name as compName, t.dept_id as deptId, d.name as deptName, t.team_type as teamType, t.update_time as updateTime, t.update_by as updateBy, t.create_time as createTime, t.create_by as createBy, t.remark, t.del_flag as delFlag, t.status as status FROM sys_team t LEFT JOIN sys_comp c ON t.comp_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_comp d ON d.id = t.dept_id where t.del_flag=0 and t.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update sys_team set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
